name: Carproof Ragdoll Fight
description:
In this game, you take control of Graham, a man designed to resist car crashes, and engage in intense boxing matches against other ragdoll opponents. With its physics-based gameplay and drunken controls, CPF promises you at least a few minutes of fun !

CPF not only offers an exciting single-player experience, but it also features a local multiplayer mode, allowing you to challenge a friend and prove who the ultimate ragdoll boxer is!

This game started as a joke on the  Graham meme and wasn't supposed to see the light of day but eventually the development continued and resulted in a little game, so I hope you will find some fun in it!

Hello
